title: Breaking Bad restaurant opens in West Hollywood
text:
A Breaking Bad pop-up restaurant opened on Wednesday in Los Angeles coinciding with the release of the TV show's sequel film, El Camino.

The pop-up restaurant has opened on the Santa Monica Boulevard in West Hollywood just a few days after the new movie was released on Netflix.

Though the 99.1 per cent pure 'Blue Sky' is strictly off the menu, diners can expect bar and waiting staff to welcome them in biohazard suits and a space kitted out to recreate the series as closely as possible.

The Breaking Bad Experience popped up in West Hollywood on Wednesday and tickets are selling out fast

The restaurant space is kitted out to resemble the series as closely as possible complete with Winnebago and Los Pollos Hermanos store front

A barman wearing a biohazard suit prepares a cocktail at the 'Breaking Bad Experience' pop up restaurant. Cocktails, according to the restaurant's website, are 'reactive' and some come with a small bag of blue crystals

Science equipment labelled with the chemicals used by the science teacher and Pinkman become the focus of a DIY cocktail mixing opportunity

One side of the restaurant features a prop Winnebago, like the one Walter White and Pinkman used to cook up their first few batches, while the facing wall shows a snarling Heisenberg.

The menu consists of Heisenburger sliders and loaded 'Saul-sa' nachos, along with a range of other Breaking Bad themed sides, desserts and drinks.

For those who really want to try 'cooking' their own batch, there's a DIY menu of chemically-reactive cocktails, according to patch.com.

A DIY menu of 'chemically-reactive' cocktails is available, as well as other Breaking Bad-themed sides, desserts and drinks

A stack of 'cash' similar to the ones Walter White struggled to launder during the series

The restaurant is studded with Instagram opportunities like taking a seat in the offices of Saul Goodman or sitting down on a thigh-height stack of cash

One wall faces a piece of artwork showing science teacher-turned drug lord character, Walter White, as he stares menacingly at the diners

The restaurant is studded with Instagram opportunities like taking a seat behind the desk of Saul Goodman or sitting down on a thigh-height stack of cash.

The restaurant opened on Wednesday and will stay open from 4pm to 10pm until the end of January.

Tickets are $30 which includes an entree and a choice of cocktail or mocktail.

According to the website, this is an adult only restaurant and parents are advised to leave children at home.

Breaking Bad Baired on AMC for five seasons from 2008-2013; The series boasts 16 Prime Time Emmy wins and 58 nominations as well as two Peabody Awards.

The legendary series followed dejected high-school chemistry teacher Walter White (Bryan Cranston), who decides to start making crystal methamphetamine with his former student Jesse, to make money for his treatment after being diagnosed with lung cancer.
description: A Breaking Bad pop-up restaurant has opened on the Santa Monica Boulevard in West Hollywood just a few days after the series' sequel film, El Camino, was released on Netflix.
